程序包 io.netty.handler.logging

Logs the I/O events for debugging purpose.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    LoggingHandler
    A ChannelHandler that logs all events using a logging framework.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    LogLevel
    Maps the regular LogLevels with the InternalLogLevel ones.
